sentences.en: He wanted to wreak something dark and unspeakable in him into cold stone.
sentences.cn: 他恨不得把自己内心里一些暧昧而数说不清的情绪用冰冷的石雕造成型.
他的举止态度坏不堪言.

sentences.en: His words were echoed with unspeakable astonishment by all but Elinor.
sentences.cn: 他的话引起了除埃莉诺以外所有人的无可形容的震惊的反响.

sentences.en: It had the sound of an unspeakable disappointment in it.
sentences.cn: 话音里包含着难以言传的失望.

sentences.en: It was Fatso who first spoke of the unspeakable thing.
sentences.cn: 这件难以启齿的事还是让胖嫂先说穿了.

sentences.en: She is suffering from unspeakable pain.
sentences.cn: 她在遭受难以形容的痛苦.

sentences.en: She suffered unspeakable trouble while she considered all these questions.
sentences.cn: 她在考虑这一切问题时,心中有说不出的烦恼.

sentences.en: The judge described the offences as nauseating and unspeakable.
sentences.cn: 法官将这些犯罪行为描述为“令人作呕、说不出口”。
国王有无法形容的威严.
疼起来厉害得无法形容。

sentences.en: The spy looked round at the two gentlemen; they both looked in unspeakable astonishment at Jerry.
sentences.cn: 密探回头望望另外两人, 两人都以难以描述的惊讶望着杰瑞.

sentences.en: The unspeakable anguish wrung his heart.
sentences.cn: 难言的痛苦折磨着他的心.

sentences.en: The unspeakable odour clung to the room.
sentences.cn: 一股难以形容的气味充斥着房间散不出去.

sentences.en: There is something unspeakable in these outposts.
sentences.cn: 边缘的有些地方难以名状.

sentences.en: While he was yet in unspeakable agonies, the dwarf renewed their conversation.
sentences.cn: 他还没来得及摆脱这种难言的痛苦时, 矮子便又恢复了他们的谈话.

trans.tran_cn: 无法形容的，坏不堪言的，不可说的，不应被讲出来的，说不出口
trans.tran_en: used for emphasizing how bad someone or something is
